kitchen: Hey! Don't just go eating any old food you find lay'n about! That could be a clue to track down that foul beast...
The name's Hans. I'm a hunter from the nearby village and my people have had enough of this beast stealing their food and livestolk!

You're chasing down the beast too, eh?

I see. So, the beast took captive your friends...? That's horrible!
It's settled! We shall work together. Should we cross paths again, I will come to your aid, little goat friend!
